input.sentences: it was time to meet [male] 's parents who lived in a remote part of location .
[male] was really close to his family and was very excited during dinner .
i was nervous but [male] made sure i was feeling okay with some jokes .
his parents were overall very nice .
practically his entire family came over to meet me .
output.sentences: This time for vacation the Smiths would visit a remote place with Mrs. SMith's parents.
At the first dinner, each younger male sat with older family members, so the older generation was excited.
Before that, Mr. Smith had been nervous because his wife didn't want him to tell his typical male jokes.
He realized soon that he had nothing to worry about.  His parents in law were very nice.
He told his soon to marry cousin not to worry because everyone willing to meet with their family in law can get along with them.
